heading: Vision
description: I want to build stuff that makes someone's life much easier. Inspired by Elon Musk and Steve Jobs, I aim to make a lasting impact through bold ideas and relentless execution.

heading: Mission
description: My path is to combine technology with continuous learning, leadership, and resilience. By taking calculated risks, building impactful tools, and embracing personal growth, I aim to create solutions that genuinely improve people's lives.

heading: Intro
description: I’m an engineer passionate about building tech that makes a difference. I’m exploring deep learning, especially LLMs and RAGs. I'm building Blissm, a mental health app.

heading: Lessons Learned
description: I've learned that growth happens when you lean into discomfort — whether it's pushing through tough workouts, handling rejection, or working on something that feels overwhelming. Struggle isn't a sign of failure; it's part of the process.
